allData.occupation: Core Medical Group Physician at Core Medical Group

positions.title: Core Medical Group Physician
positions.description:
Core Medical Group is a group of professionals, dedicated to revolutionizing the anti-aging process. Core strives to bring an innovative approach to conquering the countless adverse effects of aging experienced by many adult men and women. We design for each client a customized program with the sole objective of improving their quality of life. 

We also specialize in Erectile Dysfunction (ED) and Testosterone Replacement Therapy! 

Call us today so we can help you out of the shadows of hormone imbalances! 
FOR A FREE CONSULTATION, CALL 1-866-641-CORE (2673)

allData.headline: Core Medical Group Physician at Core Medical Group
allData.summary: The CORE Medical Group’s clinical team is led by Dr. Michael Schmidt. With over 25 years of experience as a family practitioner, Dr. Schmidt came to Core Medical Group to implement his unique approach in treating the adverse effects of aging and hormone deficiency. Dr. Schmidt’s career began as an emergency room physician where he soon developed a passion for the treatment of patients suffering from chronic disease. In his treatment of these patients, particularly those with diabetes, Dr. Schmidt took notice of a disturbing trend of severe hormone deficiencies. He discovered that once the hormone imbalance was addressed, the patients made dramatic strides in their recovery. This understanding was the catalyst for his complete dedication to treating those suffering from low levels of hormones essential for the body to perform at optimum levels. To find out more go to http://www.coremedicalgrp.com
